feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:34 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries and rain showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
